document_data.name: ''Umber Hulk Hide Heavy Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Umber hulk hide heavy shields''''' were [[shield]]s crafted using [[umber hulk]] chitin and imbued with the creature's natural magic.
document_data.Powers: These shields were created through stacking together thick umber hulk plates. They offered sturdy physical protection, similar to a ''+2'' enchantment and gave the wielder complete immunity to any mind-affecting abilities and spells.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, ''Umber hulk hide heavy shields'' were sold by a [[drow]] merchant who did business in the [[Undergate]], [[Westgate]]'s unsavory underbelly.
